long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wasting time gathering information, copy-and-pasting snippets, and making ad-hoc planning docs. Start making decisions with perfect information.

QuantCopy enables every team to run 1000s of searches in one go, get digestible reports summarized from search results, on any data source inside and outside your company.

This Chrome extension enables you to access QuantCopy on any website. Simply click the QuantCopy icon on the top right of Chrome, and a sidebar will pop up. In this sidebar, you can:

- add new topics of research
- see your existing research
- update your research sheets and notes
